author: brekke
msg: Images used by the style sheets that maven uses to render sites were not being
provided by the xdoc plugin.  Moved them from maven's xdoc/images directory
to be installed with the xdoc plugin.  They are copied into the project's
target/docs/images directory when the docs are generated.
